mapper.select: select t.task_code as taskCode,t.task_name as taskName,t.task_desc as taskDesc, t.task_status as taskStatus,t.start_date as startDate,t.end_date as endDate, t.detection_type as detectionType,t.detection_method as detectionMethod, t.mixed_mode as mixedMode,l.id as locationId,l.location_name as locationName from biz_person_task t left join biz_person_task_location l on t.task_code = l.task_code and l.deleted='0' where t.deleted='0' and exists (select 1 from biz_person_task_operator o where o.login_account=#{loginAccount} and o.task_code = t.task_code and l.id = o.location_id)
